projects.title: Cross Digit
projects.description: A procedurally generated game where players must figure out answers of mathmatical equations to complete a crossword puzzle.

projects.title: Elemental TD
projects.description: A first person magical tower defence game. Combine different elemental towers to create unique strategies.

projects.title: Highway To Hell
projects.description: A infinate runner taxi game where players must swerve to avoid obstacles and collect lost souls along the highway to hell.

projects.title: Open Arcade
projects.description: Players navigate a normal arcade, but when they try to play the games they are met with an unexpected twist on arcade classics

projects.title: Salary Nights
projects.description: A classic space shooter game built with Unity, featuring fast-paced action and beautiful space visuals.

projects.title: Tennis
projects.description: A 2D platformer game with challenging levels and unique mechanics. Features pixel art graphics and smooth animations.

projects.title: Vox Dungeon
projects.description: A challenging puzzle game that combines match-3 mechanics with RPG elements. Features procedurally generated puzzles.

projects.title: VR Museum
projects.description: A realistic racing simulator with physics-based controls and beautiful track environments.

projects.title: Dungeon Generator
projects.description: A challenging puzzle game that combines match-3 mechanics with RPG elements. Features procedurally generated puzzles.
